attributes.action: The death penalty should be an option for convicted crimes below.
attributes.additional_details: Because 20+ years behind bars for killing a defenceless baby or child isn’t enough we need much harsher punishment for this kind of evil, an all the above crimes I’ve listed. The people should not have to pay millions every year to keep this kind of evil alive
attributes.background: The death penalty should be an option for convicted terrorists, mass murderers, serial rapists, paedophiles and child killers. Only one appeal should be allowed, with no right to legal aid, which must be lodged and heard within 3 months of conviction.
